  • class time_m::StopWatch

class time_m::StopWatchÂ¶

Class for measuring time in milliseconds.

#include <Time.h>

class StopWatch {
public:
    // construction

    StopWatch();

    // methods

    void Start();
    void Stop();
    double GetFinalTime();
    double GetActualTime();
    std::string GetFinalTimeStr();
    std::string GetActualTimeStr();
};
